QuestData.Title: A Desecrated Temple
QuestData.Description:
Da spirits of da faithful flock ta me temple. Ya see dem out dere, yes?
Dey come ta enter da Other Side an' join me realm. However, spirits who've turned their backs upon Bwonsamdi, dey too have come to me temple grounds. Dey praise one called "G'huun," and spread their blood magic desecration across da Necropolis.
Dis ends now!
Go out dere and remove da desecrations dat be infesting me temple.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy $1oa Vile Desecration within the Necropolis.
